team.description: Each team member can add their own Gemini API key here
instructions: 1. Copy this file to api.json: cp api.example.json api.json
2. Get your API key from https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey
3. Replace YOUR_GEMINI_API_KEY_HERE with your actual key
4. Keep api.json private and don't commit it to version control

fallback.description: Template responses when no API key is provided
